oldWay.title: Traditional Hiring
oldWay.desc1: While you're reading the 10th resume, top candidates are already getting offers from competitors.
oldWay.desc2: A pleasant candidate often turns out to be toxic or incompetent a month after hiring.
oldWay.desc3: It's hard to prove a candidate's value when your choice is based only on a "gut feeling."
oldWay.desc4: Firing an unsuitable employee during probation costs the company 3 to 6 times their salary.
oldWay.desc5: Standard interviews allow candidates to give rehearsed answers, hiding real risks.

newWay.title: With HR Platform
newWay.desc1: The system selects the TOP 5 candidates from 100+ applications in seconds.
newWay.desc2: 6 tests (Big Five, DISC, etc.) reveal true character, motivation, and turnover risks.
newWay.desc3: Hard data that can't be disputed. Confidence in every hiring decision you make.
newWay.desc4: Perfect fit for corporate culture and the team's psychological profile on the first try.
newWay.desc5: AI prepares questions specifically for the candidate's "weak spots" identified in tests.
newWay.quote: Hire based on data, not guesses. Save your company's budget and your own peace of mind.

items.q: Do I need to install software?
items.a: No, the platform is entirely web-based. You only need internet access.

items.q: How do candidates take the tests?
items.a: You generate an invitation link in the system, and the candidate follows it to complete tests at their convenience.

items.q: How is the Match Score calculated?
items.a: The Match Score is based on an objective comparison of skills from the resume and the candidate's psychological profile with your job requirements. This eliminates bias in hiring.
